channel.title: Save On Prada PR 22MV | Prada VPR22M
channel.description: In 1913 in Milan, a man by the name of Mario Prada started a small leather goods shop with his brother, Martino, specialising in large English steamer trunks and ladies handbags. Mario Prada did not believe women had a place in business so kept the female members of his family away from the company. Ironically, [...]
